name: Best Western Plus Welcome Hotel Frankfurt

reviews.text: Second time I come at the Best Western Plus Welcome and I like this place. The location is handy and you can easily park your car in the private parking when you arrive. Rooms are spacious and well decorated, you can ask to get a room with the view on Frankfurt skycrapers and the breakfast is good. Reception staff is very nice and helpful.

The hotel is very convenient to the FRA Airport.  You can walk 250m to the Train station which connects you to everything - including the Airport. Staff is very courteous.  Onsite restaurants is very nice.
I would recommend this place.

Good location. There is a restaurant, supermarket and pharmacy near to the hotel. You can take tram U17. Bad wifi connection and poor cleaning. The room is a bit old. Breakfast too expensive, 19 euros per person.

What a wonderful stay! Tim and the other staff were always friendly, helpful and professional. Went out of their way to help on multiple occasions. We had a great night in the bistro on Friday and a lot of laughs with the bar staff and some locals! Tim arranged a room for me at short notice (discounted very reasonable rate) so I could be at the same place as my family whilst we were in Frankfurt. Lovely, clean, comfortable room and I slept very well both nights. Super relaxing, easy, comfortable stay! I would highly recommend both the hotel, but more importantly the staff. Fantastic. Well done all.

Nice hotel and aesthetically pleasing, but service was off. Checked in quite late and upon realizing there was only one 90cm blanket for the two of us and calling them for an extra one, it took 45 minutes to arrive. Very weird and a cold wait.
